title: Blade Tip (1U209)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Response: If your Nazgul wins a skirmish, transfer this condition from your support area to the losing character. Limit 1 per character. Wound bearer at the start of each fellowship phase. (If bearer is the Ring-bearer, add a burden instead )
Rarity:	U
